quote: More than anything else, I believe it's our decisions, not the conditions of our lives, that determine our destiny.
Alienation as our present destiny is achieved only by outrageous violence perpetrated by human beings on human beings.
A consistent man believes in destiny, a capricious man in chance.
A consistent soul believes in destiny, a capricious one in chance.
Actions are the seed of fate deeds grow into destiny.
Anatomy is destiny.
And the high destiny of the individual is to serve rather than to rule, or to impose himself in any other way.
And when man faces destiny, destiny ends and man comes into his own.

A consistent soul believes in destiny, a capricious one in chance.

Anatomy is destiny.
And the high destiny of the individual is to serve rather than to rule, or to impose himself in any other way.
And when man faces destiny, destiny ends and man comes into his own.
Character is our destiny.
Control your own destiny or someone else will.
Culture: the cry of men in face of their destiny.
Destiny has two ways of crushing us - by refusing our wishes and by fulfilling them.
Destiny waits alike for the free man as well as for him enslaved by another's might.
Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.
Every man has his own destiny: the only imperative is to follow it, to accept it, no matter where it leads him.
Fame comes only when deserved, and then is as inevitable as destiny, for it is destiny.
Helping people in need is a good and essential part of my life, a kind of destiny.
If life be a war, it seemed my destiny to conduct it single-handed.
It is a mistake to look too far ahead. Only one link in the chain of destiny can be handled at a time.
It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves; we are underlings.
It is the awareness of unfulfilled desires which gives a nation the feeling that it has a mission and a destiny.
It's choice - not chance - that determines your destiny.
Lots of folks confuse bad management with destiny.
Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
No cause has he to say his doom is harsh, who's made the master of his destiny.
No trumpets sound when the important decisions of our life are made. Destiny is made known silently.
Not without a shudder may the human hand reach into the mysterious urn of destiny.
On a single winged word hath hung the destiny of nations.
One country, one constitution, one destiny.
Our history is not our destiny.
Our problems are man-made, therefore they may be solved by man. No problem of human destiny is beyond human beings.
Our true destiny is not to be ministered unto but to minister to ourselves and to our fellow men.
So, if anatomy is destiny then testosterone is doom.
The destiny of any nation at any given time depends on the opinion of its young people, those under twenty-five.
The destiny of man is in his own soul

The future destiny of the child is always the work of the mother.
The high destiny of the individual is to serve rather than to rule...
There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
There is no such thing as an omen. Destiny does not send us heralds. She is too wise or too cruel for that.
There is no such thing as chance; and what seem to us merest accident springs from the deepest source of destiny.
This generation of Americans has a rendezvous with destiny.
We are not permitted to choose the frame of our destiny. But what we put into it is ours.
We write our own destiny; we become what we do.
Wedding is destiny, and hanging likewise.
What do I know of man's destiny? I could tell you more about radishes.
What is the highest secret to victory and peace? To will what God wills, and strike a league with destiny.
What sort of philosophers are we, who know absolutely nothing about the origin and destiny of cats?
Woman's destiny is to be wanton, like the bitch, the she-wolf; she must belong to all who claim her.
